ComicInfo.Penciller: Pete Costanza,Lloyd Cynwald,Sal Trapani,Pete Costanza,Lloyd Cynwald,Sal Trapani
ComicInfo.Title: Ancient Ape!; The Space Broomstick; The Mirror of Mystery!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ancient Ape!: A giant ape is discovered frozen in the ice in the Arctic. Gangster Augie O'Meara kidnaps the ape and forces it to commit crimes for him, and Magicman has a tough time defeating the ape.
The Space Broomstick: No one can explain the strange abilities of Archie Worple's broomstick.
The Mirror of Mystery!: Homer Marson has a magic mirror that creates duplicates of people, but with an opposite personality.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Zev Zimmer,Brad Everson,Greg Olivetti,Zev Zimmer,Brad Everson,Greg Olivetti
